snippet: The chief executive, Aubrey K. McClendon, has been criticized for blurring the line between his personal dealings and those of the company.
abstract: Chesapeake Energy says its chief executive Aubrey K McClendon will not receive bonus for 2012; he has been criticized for blurring line between his personal dealings and those of company.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive, Aubrey K. McClendon, has been criticized for blurring the line between his personal dealings and those of the company.
